org.netbeans.core.multitabs

Class TabDisplayerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.core.multitabs.TabDisplayerFactory

  • public abstract class TabDisplayerFactory
extends Object
    Factory to create TabDisplayer instances. Third-parties can register their own factory in the global Lookup to override the default TabDisplayer implementations.
    See Also:
    TabDisplayer, Lookup

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TabDisplayerFactory()

      static TabDisplayerFactory getDefault()

    • Method Detail

      • getDefault

        public static TabDisplayerFactory getDefault()
        Returns:
        TabDisplayerFactory from the global Lookup or the default implementation.

      • createTabDisplayer

        public abstract TabDisplayer createTabDisplayer(TabDataModel tabModel,
                                                int orientation)
        Creates a new TabDisplayer instance from the given tab model.
        Parameters:
        tabModel - Tab model.
        orientation - Tab placement.
        Returns:
        New tab displayer.
